1: <pb/>Eh re' i Balaam je' wili i xuq'or reh i Balac: <pb/>Re' hat ayu' naa ayejaam weh i wuquub' chi artaal, eh nee nak'am cho weh i wuquub' chi imas wakax, eh wuquub' chi imas tentzun, inki.
2: <pb/>Eh re' Balac xub'an wo' hoq i xq'orarik reh ruum i Balaam. Eh pankib'al xkik'at i ju'jun chi imas wakax i ju'jun chi imas tentzun chinaah i ju'jun chi artaal.
3: <pb/>Eh re' i Balaam je' wili i xuq'or reh i reey Balac: <pb/>Re' hat tikaan pee kahnoq ruuk' i mayiij, re' hin naa wojiik chi rilariik, xk'ulik-oq chi wula'jiik i QaJaaw Dios. Eh xa chib'ih pa' jariik i nee ruyeew weh chi naab'jik neenuq'or aweh, inki. <pb/>Eh xooj chinaah jinaj i yuuq' ma' xta ch'ahn chuwach.
4: Eh re' i QaJaaw Dios ar xk'ulik rula'eej i Balaam, re' i Balaam je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Re' hin wuquub' i artaal xnuyeew chi korb'eesjik. Eh chikinaah i ju'jun i artaal ju'jun imas wakax, eh ju'jun imas tentzun xnuk'at chi mayiij, inki.
5: <pb/>Re' i QaJaaw Dios xuq'or reh i Balaam i naa ruq'orom, je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Hiy wo' chik aha' wilik chaloq i Balac eh cha q'or reh i xnuq'or aweh, inki.
6: <pb/>Eh re' Balaam sutinik wo' reje eh xponik rureq i reey Balac chi pa'lik i koq ruuk' i mayiij k'ahchi' ruk'ahtiik ruch'ihil taqe ar i k'amal kib'eeh i aj Moab.
7: Re' Balaam je' wili i xuq'or parutz'uuy. <pb/><t>Re' i Balac kireey i aj Moab ko ar Aram xutaq'aaj nuk'amariik</t> <t>xinik'ik cho chinaah taqe i yuuq' wilkeeb'</t> <t>chi korkiil reje i reelb'aal q'iij, je' wili i xuq'or:</t> <t>Kim k'oloq apahqaaj i ma' holohik taj chikinaah i aj Israel,</t> <t>re' taqe i riih rumaam i Jacob, inki weh.</t>
8: <t>Eh 多Nik' wach nupahqaam i hin</t> <t>i ma' holohik taj chikinaah taqe i rukuxisam i Dios?</t> <t>多Nik' wach nuq'eb'em i hin i ma' xiq'eb'arik ta ruum i Dios?</t>
9: <t>Ruum re' hin kochinaah i yuuq' wilik wii'</t> <t>taqe nimaq ab'aj inwilow reje.</t> <t>Eh kochinaah taqe inajt kinaah yuuq'</t> <t>wili inwilow reje i tinamit Israel</t> <t>chi sik'ooj kiwach, ma' je' ta kikab' i tokoom i tinamit.</t>
10: <t>Re' taqe i riih rumaam i Jacob</t> <t>ma' awach ta neenkuywik kajaljiik, je' kik'ihaal saniib'.</t> <t>Re' hin q'e' naq inwaaj chi nee</t> <t>kinkimik chi je' rukab' noq kikimik</t> <t>taqe i korik wach kik'ux, inki Balaam.</t>
11: <pb/>Eh re' i reey Balac, je' wili i xuq'or reh i Balaam: <pb/>多Chib'ih jariik i k'ahchi' kaat? Re' hin xat nuk'am chaa yu' reh chi naa apahqaam i ma' holohik taj chikinaah i aj Israel, ki-ixowanik nuwach. Eh re' hat holohik chik inchel i k'ahchi' apahqaam chikinaah, inki.
12: <pb/>Re' i Balaam je' wili ruchaq'weesjiik xub'an: <pb/>Re' hin xnuq'or aweh chi xa re' wo' naa nuq'orom aweh i naa ruq'orom weh i QaJaaw Dios, inki.
13: <pb/>Eh re' reey Balac je' wo' chik wili i xuq'or reh i Balaam: <pb/>Re' hat taq chi wiij pan jino'q chik tokoom ye'aab' aha' xa re' i chi junsuut i ki-itz'ihy naah paat i aj Israel ink'utinik. Ma' nee ta nawil kiwach chi korik, ar neenapahqaaj i ma' holohik taj chikinaah, inki.
14: <pb/>Eh re' i Balac xuk'am wo' reje i Balaam chupaam i ye'aab' Zofim wilik chinaah i yuuq' Pisga, eh ar xuyejaa' i wuquub' chi artaal, chinaah i ju'jun chi artaal re' re' xuk'at i ju'jun chi kok' imas wakax, eh ju'jun imas tentzun.
15: Eh noq wilkeeb' ar, re' Balaam je' wili i xuq'or reh i reey Balac: <pb/>Re' hat tikaan pee kahnoq ruuk' i mayiij, eh re' hin naa rojiik nuqoreem i QaJaaw Dios, inki.
16: <pb/>Eh re' i QaJaaw Dios xk'ulik wo' chik chi q'orob'jiik i Balaam xuq'or wo' reh i naa ruq'orom. Eh je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Re' hat ti sutinoq wo' chik reje aha' wilik wii' i Balac, re' wo' chik neenaq'or reh i xnuq'or aweh pampeet, inkih.
17: <pb/>Re' Balaam xsutinik wo' reje ruuk' i reey Balac xponik rureq chi pa'lik i koq ruuk' i mayiij k'ahchi' ruk'ahtiik, eh ruch'ihil taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj Moab. Eh re' i Balac xupahqaaj reh i Balaam chi je' wili: <pb/>多Chib'ih xuq'or i QaJaaw? inki.
18: <pb/>Eh re' i Balaam je' wo' chik wili i xuq'or parutz'uuy: <pb/><t>Re' hat reey Balac rak'uun i Zipor</t> <t>chab'iraj chi korik i naa nuq'orom aweh.</t>
19: <t>Re' i QaJaaw Dios ma' re' taj jino'q winaq chi neenchukwik q'orik,</t> <t>eh chi neerujal wach i rukapeb'aal.</t> <t>Aha' wilik i ruq'or inooj eloq wach.</t> <t>Eh noq i ruq'or chi wilik i naa rub'anam i rub'an wo' hoq.</t>
20: <t>Re' hin xuq'or weh i Dios chi naa nukuxisam i tinamit Israel.</t> <t>Eh re' hin ma' nee ta rub'an chi nee nujal wach i xuq'or weh.</t>
21: <t>Eh ma' xtaj i jot'ooj k'ahchi' keeb' i aj Israel</t> <t>re' taqe i riih rumaam i Jacob.</t> <t>Re' i kaJaaw ki Dios wilik kuuk' chi juneliik,</t> <t>eh inkiloq'ej chi kireey.</t>
22: <t>Re' wo' hoq i ki Dios x-esanik cho keh pan tinamit Egipto.</t> <t>Eh xuyeew kikowiil, je' kowiil imas wakax wilik pan raxchee'.</t>
23: <t>Eh ma' awach taj i ma' holohik ta nee nq'orik chikiij,</t> <t>ma' jino'q i aj q'iij ma' holohik ta nee nq'orik chikiij i aj Israel.</t> <t>Je' la' wili i ruk'ul chi neen q'orariik chikiij:</t> <t>Chakoj taq rehtaal chi re' Dios ma' k'isiin ta xukuxisaj</t> <t>i tinamit Israel, inko'q taqe.</t>
24: <t>Re' taqe i aj Israel yohb'aal wach i kijosq'iil,</t> <t>eh ma' naa ta kihi'lik korehtaal inkisach wach i nixowanik kiwach.</t> <t>Eh je' rukab' i rub'an i kaq b'ahlam</t> <t>noq i ruchop i rutiib' korehtaal i rutz'ap wach,</t> <t>eh i ruk'ej haa' i kik', inki.</t>
25: <pb/>Eh re' i reey Balac je' wili xuq'or reh i Balaam: <pb/>Ruum chi ma' xuyeew ta riib' chi xapahqaaj i ma' holohik taj chikinaah i aj Israel, maa pahqaaj wo' i holohik chikinaah, inki.
26: <pb/>Re' Balaam je' wili ruchaq'weesjiik xub'an: <pb/>Re' hin nuq'orom aweh chi xa re' wo' naa nub'anam i naa ruq'orom weh i QaJaaw Dios, inki.
27: <pb/>Eh re' reey Balac je' wili ruchaq'weesjiik xub'an: <pb/>Re' hin i nuq'or aweh chi nee tiooj chi wiij pan jino'q chik ye'aab', ma' nee ta oon naq inchenyoj ruk'ux i Dios chi ar nee napahqaaj i ma' holohik taj chikinaah i aj Israel, inki.
28: <pb/>Je' re' noq re' i Balac xuk'am reje i Balaam kochinaah i yuuq' Peor, re' ink'utinik cho wii' chu'nchel i chiq yuuq'.
29: Eh ar re' i Balaam, je' wili i xuq'or reh i Balac: <pb/>Yu'naak i hat cha yejaa' weh ayu' wuquub'-oq i artaal, eh nee nak'am chaloq i wuquub' chi kok' imas wakax, eh wuquub' imas tentzun, inki.
30: <pb/>Re' reey Balac xub'an wo' hoq i xq'orarik reh ruum i Balaam. Eh chinaah i ju'jun chi artaal xuk'at chi mayiij i ju'jun imas wakax, eh ju'jun imas tentzun.
